name: My Codespace OCCDemo
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get install build-essential procps curl file git && sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Linuxbrew/install/master/install.sh)" && test -d ~/.linuxbrew && eval $(~/.linuxbrew/bin/brew shellenv) && test -d /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew && eval $(/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/bin/brew shellenv) && test -r ~/.profile && echo "eval \$($(brew --prefix)/bin/brew shellenv)" >>~/.profile && echo "eval \$($(brew --prefix)/bin/brew shellenv)" >>~/.profile && source ~/.profile
